actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Projects SET
		ProjectName = '{{update_form1.fieldState.ProjectName.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.ProjectName : update_form1.sourceData.ProjectName}}',
		PSALink = '{{update_form1.fieldState.PSALink.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.PSALink : update_form1.sourceData.PSALink}}',
    Projects.Desc = '{{update_form1.fieldState.Desc.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.Desc : update_form1.sourceData.Desc}}',
		Notes = '{{update_form1.fieldState.Notes.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.Notes : update_form1.sourceData.Notes}}',
		PM = '{{update_form1.fieldState.PM.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.PM : update_form1.sourceData.PM}}',
		Team = '{{update_form1.fieldState.Team.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.Team : update_form1.sourceData.Team}}',
		ServerLink = '{{update_form1.fieldState.ServerLink.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.ServerLink : update_form1.sourceData.ServerLink}}',
		Status = '{{update_form1.fieldState.Status.isVisible ? update_form1.formData.Status : update_form1.sourceData.Status}}'

  WHERE ProjectID = {{data_table.selectedRow.ProjectID}};
